(Simplified: 蒉)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 貴 indicates the sound; 艹 (plant) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • 貴 [ guì ] expensive, costly; valuable, precious
①古代用草編的筐子，一般用來盛土：“有荷蕢而過孔氏之門者”。

蕢字的基本解释

蕢
kuì

蕢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuì］
［《廣韻》求位切，去至，羣。］
“蒉1”的繁体字。
(1)草织的盛器。
(2)草鞋。
[②]［kuài］
［《廣韻》苦怪切，去怪，溪。］
“蒉2”的繁体字。
(1)芜秽。
(2)姓。春秋时鲁国有蒉尚。见《礼记·檀弓下》。
[③]［kuài］
［《集韻》苦會切，去隊，溪。］
通“塊1”。“蒉3”的繁体字。
见“蕢3桴”。

蕢字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蕢； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1058第28
〔古文〕?【唐韻】【韻會】?求位切，音匱。【說文】草器。【論語】有荷蕢而過孔氏之門者。　又山名。【前漢·高帝紀】沛公引兵繞嶢關，踰蕢山。　又【集韻】苦怪切，音喟。菜名。【爾雅·釋草】蕢，赤莧。【註】今莧菜之有赤莖者。　又與?通。【禮·禮運】蕢桴而土鼓。【註】蕢讀爲?，聲之誤也，謂摶土爲桴也。　又姓。【禮·檀弓】公使人弔蕢尚。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋草】蕢，赤莧。【註】今莧菜之有赤根者。〕　謹照原文赤根改赤莖。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kuì］
["Guangyun" Seek position, go to, group. ]
"蒉1" in traditional characters.
(1) Straw container.
(2) Straw shoes.
[②]［kuài］
["Guangyun" is bitter and strange, go to blame, Xi. ]
"蒉2" in traditional characters.
(1) Wu Hui.
(2) Last name. In the Spring and Autumn Period, the State of Shandong was still alive. See "Book of Rites under Tan Gong".
[③]［kuài］
["Ji Yun" will cut hard, go to the team, Xi. ]
Pass "Block 1". "蒉3" in traditional characters.
See "蒉3桴".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zhezi] 　蒉; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1058 28
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] [Yunhui]? Seek position, lack of sound. [Said Wen] Caoqi. [The Analects] Those who pass through Kong's gate with lotus.　Also the name of the mountain. [Pre-Han·Gao Di Ji] Peigong led troops around Yaoguan, surpassing Lai Mountain.　[Jiyun] bitter and strange, sounding. The name of the dish. 【Erya·Shuicao】Lemon, red amaranth. [Note] Today's amaranth has red stems.　Connect with? 【Ritual·Ritual fortune】Like and earthy drums. [Note] Kui is pronounced as ?, which means that the sound is wrong, and it is said that Tuan Tu is 桴 Ye.　Another last name. 【Rite·Tan Gong】The minister salutes Shang. Textual research: [[Erya·Shucao] Kui, red amaranth. [Note] Today's amaranth has red roots. 〕　I would like to change the red roots to the red stems according to the original text.
